Allows manipulation of stopwatches to keep track of time.

Time is in seconds with three decimal points of accuracy (Ex: <code>0.961s</code>)

Is not affected by pausing or by [[Commands/tick|<code>/tick</code>]].

== Syntax ==
* '''''Java Edition'''''
: <code>stopwatch create <id></code> - Creates a stopwatch
: <code>stopwatch query <id> scale</code> - Gets the value of the stopwatch (<code>scale</code> does not affect the displayed value in chat, but does otherwise work)
: <code>stopwatch restart <id></code> - Resets a stopwatch
: <code>stopwatch remove <id></code> - Removes a stopwatch
